description: Retrospective planning application for the installation of two flues for the pizza restaurant at 257 Mare Street (Ref:2013/2684)
subdivision_of_building: Changes to the flue specification from the approved from the F&B unit on 257 Mare Street 2013/2684 (then submission of details pursuant to condition 5 (extract equipment) and approved 2014/3293).
decision_conditions: <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-0c8660a5-7fff-8bbc-8e7a-6f776ae88382"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">The information submitted is of insufficient quality and content to be able to make an accurate assessment in terms of residential amenities. In the absence of an odour report; officers are unable to make an accurate assessment in terms of odour amenity impacts of the proposed development. The proposal is therefore, contrary to policy LP2 (Development and Amenity) of the Hackney Local Plan LP33 (2020).</span></span></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-2c13e176-7fff-0a71-b616-16e0e931c79f"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">Due to the increased noise level of the flue and its close proximity to neighbouring properties, the development would have an unacceptable amenity impact with respect to noise on neighbouring properties.&nbsp; The proposed development would therefore fail to be in accordance with policy LP2 of the Hackney Local Plan (2020).</span></span></p>
